mapper.select: SELECT c.`id`, `cinema_name`, `detailed_address`, `cinema_landline`, cs.`service_name`, crs.`service_remarks`, ca.`img_route` FROM `cinema` AS c INNER JOIN `cinema_relation_service` AS crs ON c.`id` = crs.`cniema_id` INNER JOIN `cinema_service` AS cs ON crs.`service_id` = cs.`id` INNER JOIN `cinema_atlas` AS ca ON c.`id` = ca.`cinema_id` WHERE c.`id` = #{cinemaId}
